urls.title: Do I get a boarding pass if I check-in through mobile check-in?
urls.description: Do I get a boarding pass if I check-in through mobile check-in? Depending on your departure point and the requirements of the respective airport authorities, you will either get a mobile boarding pass or a PDF boarding pass. In addition to this, you will also receive a mobile check-in confirmation email for your reference. - For a mobile boarding passes, your boarding pass will be saved automatically on the Malaysia Airlines app that you are using (iOS or Android). urls.title: [Wheelchair] If my wheelchair request was made less than 48 hours before my flight, will my request be honoured?
urls.description: [Wheelchair] If my wheelchair request was made less than 48 hours before my flight, will my request be honoured? Requests made less than 48 hours before flight is subject to wheelchair availability. This service will, however, be made available in the following situations; Emergency cases (Injury/health condition) Passengers with reduced mobility ( with a valid disability card ) Pregnant women Elderly (60 years and above) Can't find the answer you are looking for? Ask us through one of the channels
